<Text: Apodemia mormo, the Mormon metalmark, is a species of metalmark butterfly (family Riodinidae).>

Text: Apodemia mormo:  Its upperside is orange-brown to black, checkered with black and white spots.

Text: Apodemia mormo:  Its adult food is nectar from the flowers of "Eriogonum" and other plants, especially yellow-flowered composites, such as "Senecio" and "Chrysothamnus" (rabbitbrush).
